[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Project-22.jpg” title_text=”EWL-Project-22″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Kuwait International Airport (KIA), Kuwait New Terminal 2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Located in Kuwait, the Directorate General of Civil Aviation financed the construction of 85,000 m² of a new terminal area for 11 million passengers per year.  For this project, our team provided the services of Terminal Master Planning, Feasibility Study, Financing Investigation and Concept, Space and Functional Planning. We used our team’s technical expertise in: Architecture and Structure, Baggage Handling Landside and Airside Access to ensure that correct facilities were provided.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl(cabecera)” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ bottom_divider_style=”asymmetric2″ bottom_divider_color=”#515553″ global_module=”740″ locked=”off” collapsed=”off”][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”footer-ewl” _builder_version=”3.29.3″ background_color=”#515553″ min_height=”470px” custom_padding=”27px|||||” global_module=”730″ locked=”off” collapsed=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ custom_padding=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://ewlinternational.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/EWL-Logo-3-copia.png” title_text=”EWL Logo 3 copia” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ _module_preset=”default”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.29.3″][et_pb_blurb title=”UK” _builder_version=”4.6.5″ header_font=”Amethysta|700||on|||||” header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ffffff” header_font_size=”23px” body_font=”Open Sans||||||||” body_text_align=”center” body_text_color=”#a5a5a5″ body_font_size=”17px” body_line_height=”1.3em”]
